General.Name: First Helium Inc
General.Description: First Helium Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, production, and evaluation of helium, petroleum, and natural gas property interests in Alberta, Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the Worsley Trend and Worsley Property located in the Worsley Trend, Northern Alberta. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6

1.Name: Mr. Robert James Scott C.A., C.F.A., CPA, CA, CFA, CPA
1.Title: CFO & Director
